thread.title: M.I.A. Publicly Begs Radiohead to Play Her Meltdown Festival
thread.title_full: M.I.A. Publicly Begs Radiohead to Play Her Meltdown Festival

author: Noah Yoo
title: M.I.A. Publicly Begs Radiohead to Play Her Meltdown Festival
text:
M.I.A. Publicly Begs Radiohead to Play Her Meltdown Festival “I know it's a long shot but I live for long shots” MIA: Photo by David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for Stella McCartney Thom: Photo by Jim Bennett/FilmMagic 
M.I.A. is curating the 2017 edition of Meltdown Festival in London this summer. When news broke of her curatorial role earlier this month, the singer suggested that her fans send in tips. Now, M.I.A. has taken to Twitter to ask Radiohead to consider performing at the festival this year, saying, “I know it's a long shot but I live for long shots, please come play Meltdown.” The festival takes place from June 9-18. Earlier this year, Radiohead announced European tour dates; they’re playing shows in Sweden, Denmark, Italy, and the Netherlands in the time that Meltdown is taking place.
